Package com.ibm.itim.pim.authority

Provides an application programming interface for shared access authorization

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
SharedAccessAuthorizationStrategy IBM Confidential OCO Source Materials (C) Copyright IBM Corp.
 

Class Summary
SharedAccessSearchFilter This class defines the search attributes for the shared accesses.
 

Enum Summary
SharedAccessSearchFilter.AccountStatus Enumeration of Account status
ACTIVE - indicates search only active accounts credential INACTIVE - indicates search only inactive accounts credential ALL - indicates search both active and inactive accounts credential
SharedAccessSearchFilter.ExclusiveOption Enumeration of Credential exclusive option EXCLUSIVE - indicates search only credentials configured as exclusive checkout NONEXCLUSIVE - indicates search only credentials configured as non-exclusive checkout search ALL - indicates search credentials regardless of exclusivity
SharedAccessSearchFilter.SearchOption Enumeration of Credential search option ENABLED - indicates search only credentials enabled for checkout search DISABLED - indicates search only credentials disabled for checkout search ALL - indicates search credentials regardless of the checkout search setting
SharedAccessSearchFilter.ViewPasswordOption Enumeration of password viewable option ENABLED - indicates search only credentials which password are viewable DISABLED - indicates search only credentials which password are not viewable ALL - indicates search credentials regardless if password are viewable
 

Exception Summary
SharedAccessAuthorityException This exception is thrown to indicate an error condition during shared access authorization.
 

Package com.ibm.itim.pim.authority Description

Provides an application programming interface for shared access authorization

The shared access authorization API has been developed to allow a customer to plug-in their own shared access authorization evaluator bypassing ISIM's uses of Shared Access Policies.


Refer Shared Access Authorization Strategy in examples to learn how to build an authority to authorize users to check out shared access.
